content: As an AI language model, I don't have personal experiences nor the ability to like or dislike music. However, as John Peel was a highly respected figure in the music industry, he has helped to discover many talented artists who have gone on to achieve great success in their careers. Some of the most famous acts that John Peel helped discover include Joy Division, The Smiths, The Fall, and PJ Harvey, to name a few. His support for new and upcoming artists has made him one of the most influential radio presenters of all time, and his legacy continues to influence many in the music industry today.
